hotels.title: Swiss Alpine Chalet-Style Retreat near Bern with Onsite Dining, Spa & Swimming Pool
hotels.description: Nestled in the car-free haven of Wengen, this hideaway offers an authentic Swiss alpine escape where tranquillity reigns supreme. Admire the majestic Jungfrau and the Bernese Alps, savour universal flavours and alpine-inspired shared plates at Restaurant Waldrand or enjoy a signature cocktail at Bergwald Bar. Indulge in the Japanese-inspired spa and float in mineral-rich waters before retreating to the serene relaxation room with a herbal tea in hand, gazing upon uninterrupted mountain vistas. Whether you're seeking winter skiing adventures or summer hiking excursions, this hotel is your basecamp in the pristine Bernese Highlands.
